con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="calculator" targetNamespace="http://services.bawi.com/calculator" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://services.bawi.com/calculator" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://services.bawi.com/calculator" schemaLocation="../xsd/calculator.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="CalculatorRQ"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CalculatorRQ" name="request"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CalculatorRS"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CalculatorRS" name="response"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CalculatorFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CalculatorRS" name="fault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="calculatorServiceInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="calculate"> <wsdl:input name="calculatorRequest" message="tns:CalculatorRQ"/> <wsdl:output name="calculatorResponse" message="tns:CalculatorRS"/> <wsdl:fault name="calculatorError" message="tns:CalculatorFault"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="calculatorSOAP" type="tns:calculatorServiceInterface"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="calculate"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="calculator"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:calculatorSOAP" name="calculatorSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://services.bawi.com/calculator"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://services.bawi.com/calculator" jaxb:version="2.0" jaxb:extensionBindingPrefixes="xjc" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://services.bawi.com/calculator" xmlns:jaxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb" xmlns:xjc="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb/xjc"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <jaxb:globalBindings> <xjc:simple/> </jaxb:globalBindings> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> <!--Xml elements--> <xsd:element name="CalculatorRQ" type="CalculatorRQ"/> <xsd:element name="CalculatorRS" type="CalculatorRS"/> <!--Xml types--> <xsd:simpleType name="operation"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ADD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBSTRACT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MULTIPLY"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DIVIDE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="CalculatorRQ"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="parameters" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="operation" type="operation"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CalculatorRS"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="result" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
